metadata.title: CVE-2017-2584 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
arch/x86/kvm/emulate.c in the Linux kernel through 4.9.3 allows local usersto obtain sensitive information from kernel memory or cause a denial ofservice (use-after-free) via a crafted application that leveragesinstruction emulation for fxrstor, fxsave, sgdt, and sidt.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2584` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

No subscription required
